title: Encode Mighty Things
content:
NASA JPL engineers landed a rover on Mars.

People from around the world decoded the message in the parachute they designed.

I’m Noah Liebman, and I just made this small tribute to their work. You can see other things I’ve done at my personal homepage (because those are still a thing), Twitter, Mastodon, GitHub, etc.

Speaking of GitHub, this is on there.
author: John Gruber
